articles.title: Shiba Inu Price Might Increase 5X, but Bitgert has the Potential of 100X - Analytics Insight
articles.description: The Shiba Inu and Bitgert performances have been impressive in the past few weeks. Though Shiba Inu has been doing well lately, it has also been one of the fast-plummeting cryptocurrencies of 2022.
articles.content: The Shiba Inu and Bitgert performances have been impressive in the past few weeks. In the past 30 days, Coinmarketcap data shows that Shiba Inu increased by 10%, which is one of its best performances… [+2733 chars]

articles.title: Adani Power hits 10% upper circuit; here's why - Economic Times
articles.description: The stock has seen a massive rally in the last few weeks. Last week it was the top BSE 500, gaining 42 per cent as it concluded its acquisition of Essar Power MP.
articles.content:
Shares of Adani Power zoomed 10 per cent on Tuesday after reports said 32 lakh shares or 0.2 per cent of the equity exchanged hands in a block deal.
